::Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite/Sharpclaws::

Aelo, Celeno, Ocipite arrived sooner where new Predacon where ans 
when they saw they problem they said each other at time: Perceptor's 
squad could help us to free them quickly...

Aelo: Amazon's squad to Sharpclaws, Deepfear, Underground, Charon...
Celeno: We need help to free some Predacons...
Ocipite: And later go to battle...

Sharpclaws: Are you insane ladies???? Darkfate need us in Artic!!!!!
Aelo: Come on... They could be allies..
Sharpclaws: But Darkfate...
Celeno: Darkfate will need them to beat the rebels!!!
Ocipite: And later Destroy MAximals!!!
Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: We can't free them quickly without you help!!!...
Sharpclaws: Ok.. OK. we free them and later we will go to the 
fight!!!! We're on the way...

As soon as Sharpclaws end the transmition, the three ladies saw each 
other and said.
Aelo: We need start to work..
Celeno: We need more power to free them
Ocipite: we need to use our special trick...
Aelo/Celeno/Ocipite: It's time to transform in Hecate..

And the process to make the femenine gelstat started...






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     He heard the message from the Predacon. His scanners were 
attuned for any stasis pods. He also picked up another one, 
unfortunatly he didn't have the man power in his base to send someone 
to them both. He might have to go himself.
>     Walking out of the base and turning the autoguns to full alert 
he commed the bots in his base.
>     "I have to take a short leave for a while, I'm sure you will 
find the base...hospitable," With that all the doors locked the 
computers shut down, nothing was going to happen in that base, 
nothing.
>     He walked to the water and, spliting his robot mode, he put 
Seasaurus in the water to wait, while Skysaurus went to Moscow and 
Landsaurus went to visit this new Predacon.
